mapper.select: select HandicapInfo.handicapinfo_id, HandicapInfo.handicapped_id, HandicapInfo.handicap_type, HandicapInfo.handicap_level, HandicapInfo.reliability_th, HandicapInfo.severity, HandicapInfo.comment from HandicapInfo where handicapinfo_id = #{handicapinfo_id}

select HandicapMaster.handicap_name, HandicapInfo.handicap_type, HandicapInfo.handicap_level, HandicapInfo.reliability_th, HandicapInfo.severity, HandicapInfo.comment from HandicapInfo left join HandicapMaster on HandicapMaster.handicap_type = HandicapInfo.handicap_type where HandicapInfo.handicapped_id = #{handicapped_id}

select HandicapInfo.handicapinfo_id, HandicapInfo.handicapped_id, HandicapInfo.handicap_type, HandicapInfo.handicap_level, HandicapInfo.reliability_th, HandicapInfo.severity, HandicapInfo.comment from HandicapInfo where handicapped_id = #{handicapped_id}
